projects.name: Movie site
projects.text: This is a pair project where we buildt a movie site, fetching API's and were learning about React Router Dom. It's two pages with responsive design

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.text: In this project, I practiced my React state skills by fetching and posting data to an API while building a Twitter (X)-like project. I have also buildt my own API to this project using MongoDB.

projects.name: Quiz
projects.text: The Quiz is a group project were we worked in branches and working together with live share. We use Zustand in our global state management

projects.name: Survey
projects.text: We was practising React state and controlled forms by making a Typeform-like product. It's a pair project and and we build a multi-step form using React Hook useSate.

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.text: The chat bot app is a conversational AI-powered tool designed to inform you about unsusal animals

projects.name: Weather app
projects.text: It's a  simple weather app that provides the current weather using an API

projects.name: Music Release
projects.text: A music app that shows the latest releases from spotify

projects.name: The Pizza Project
projects.text: This app is allows you to customize and order your favorite pizza using a simple user interface. I twisted the topic so it's about booking a lecture in a handcraft you are intrested in

projects.name: Guess Who Game
projects.text: This is a classic game to guess the hidden character
